Articles.Content: Ok, I though that I might combine the idea of following the entirety of the Russian space station program from the early Salyut missions through the building of Mir (I am excluding the ISS as that was an international project). I was wondering what everyone thought about the idea? Any thoughts?
Don't forget Almaz and check out the Tantares mod.

> 
> Don't forget Almaz and check out the Tantares mod.

I wasn't originally going to do Almaz, but, if I get enough support to do that, then I will add that into the series!
Sure. Salyut was very interesting and Mir is something I watched glide across the sky. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Definitely. I feel like Salyut doesn't get enough love when it comes to the history of space stations. And Mir was an amazing feat of engineering (first modular space station) and politics (Shuttle-Mir).

Ok, here is the planned mod list to date:

Mods to be used (primarily):

OLDD Proton

Bobcat Ind. Mir pack

Component Space Shuttle

Raidernick Soyuz & Salyut pack

Raidernick Russian Probes pack (for the Soyuz rocket)

Mechjeb 2

KAS

Laztech

EVE

Kerbal Konstructs

KK Kosmodrome

Its actually really easy to use. Just drag and drop like all other mods..
